title: What is the state of science and technology during the Japanese regime? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pretty much the same as the rest of the planet. If it wasn’t part of the war effort, it was ignored. There are even reports that Japan was trying to develop it’s own Atomic Bomb, but didn’t even get as far as their NAZI allies. And then there’s the infamous human experiments of Unit 731.

The Japanese had a superb Navy (particularly skilled in Night operations..of course dont tell an American like Trump that) And they also had and developed the biggest Submarines in wwii..THE I class submarines which carried a plane with the wings folded on it)
